name: Air Lease Corporation
description: Air Lease Corporation (ALC) is a leading global aircraft leasing company that specializes in the acquisition and leasing of commercial jet aircraft to airlines worldwide. Founded in 2010 by Steven F. Udvar-Házy, a pioneer in the aircraft leasing industry, ALC has rapidly established itself as a key player in the aviation sector. The company provides a diverse fleet of modern, fuel-efficient aircraft, including narrow-body, wide-body, and regional jets, catering to a variety of airline customers. ALC's business model focuses on long-term lease agreements, offering airlines the flexibility to optimize their fleets without the significant capital investment associated with aircraft purchases. With a strong commitment to customer service and operational excellence, Air Lease Corporation supports its clients with tailored solutions and innovative leasing structures. The company is also engaged in the management of aircraft portfolios, providing strategic advice and support to its airline partners. ALC is recognized for its strong financial position and prudent risk management practices, which have allowed it to navigate the complexities of the global aviation market effectively. As air travel continues to recover and grow post-pandemic, ALC is well-positioned to capitalize on emerging opportunities in the airline industry.

seo.meta_title: Air Lease Corporation | Global Aircraft Leasing Leader
seo.meta_description: Discover Air Lease Corporation, a leading global aircraft leasing company providing modern, fuel-efficient aircraft to airlines worldwide.

faq.question: What does Air Lease Corporation do?
faq.answer: Air Lease Corporation specializes in the acquisition and leasing of commercial jet aircraft to airlines around the world.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Air Lease Corporation?
faq.answer: The CEO of Air Lease Corporation is Steven F. Udvar-Házy.

faq.question: Where is Air Lease Corporation headquartered?
faq.answer: Air Lease Corporation is headquartered in Los Angeles, California, USA.

faq.question: What types of aircraft does Air Lease Corporation lease?
faq.answer: Air Lease Corporation leases narrow-body jets, wide-body jets, and regional jets.

faq.question: When was Air Lease Corporation founded?
faq.answer: Air Lease Corporation was founded in 2010.
